objects

Class Shareholder

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Shareholder

  • public class Shareholder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the Shareholder object. Shareholder has name, id, portfolio, and active properties.
    Author:
    Fernando Rodriguez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shareholder(java.lang.String shName, int idnum, boolean active)
      Constructor for Shareholder object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean buy(Company comp, int amount)
      This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to buy Shares from a Company.
      void changeActivity()
      Changes the activity of this Shareholder to active if inactive and vice versa.
      boolean getActivity()
      Getter: returns if user is active or not
      int getIdnum()
      Getter: Returns the id of the Shareholder
      java.util.ArrayList<Shares> getPortfolio()
      Returns the list of Shares owned by this Shareholder.
      java.lang.String getShName()
      Getter: Returns The name of a Shareholder.
      boolean sell(Company comp, int amount, Shareholder holder)
      This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to sell Shares from a Company.
      void setIdnum(int idnum)
      Setter: Assigns a new ID number for this Shareholder.
      void setShName(java.lang.String shName)
      Setter: Sets a new name for the Shareholder.
      java.lang.String showPortfolio()
      This method is a to String of sorts for the Shareholder object.
      int summary(Shareholder holder, Company comp)
      This method will make a summary of all of the Shares purchased by this Shareholder for a Company and return the max amount of available Shares in the Shareholder's portfolio.
      java.lang.String toFile()
      This method will convert the object into a line formated to be stored in the reports.txt file.

      • Shareholder

        public Shareholder(java.lang.String shName,
                   int idnum,
                   boolean active)
        Constructor for Shareholder object.
        Parameters:
        shName - The name of the Shareholder.
        idnum - Identification number for the Shareholder
        active - defines if this is an Active Shareholder or not.

      • showPortfolio

        public java.lang.String showPortfolio()
        This method is a to String of sorts for the Shareholder object. It will return the string representation of the Shareholder's protfolio.
        Returns:
        String representation of Shareholders portfolio.

      • toFile

        public java.lang.String toFile()
        This method will convert the object into a line formated to be stored in the reports.txt file.
        Returns:
        String representation of this object.

      • buy

        public boolean buy(Company comp,
                   int amount)
        This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to buy Shares from a Company.
        Parameters:
        comp - Desired Company the Shareholder want to purchase Shares from.
        amount - The Desired amount of Shares to be purchased.
        Returns:
        true if purchase was successful, false otherwise.

      • sell

        public boolean sell(Company comp,
                    int amount,
                    Shareholder holder)
        This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to sell Shares from a Company.
        Parameters:
        comp - Desired Company the Shareholder want to sell Shares from.
        amount - The Desired amount of Shares to be purchased.
        holder - Shareholder who is performing the sell.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.

      • summary

        public int summary(Shareholder holder,
                   Company comp)
        This method will make a summary of all of the Shares purchased by this Shareholder for a Company and return the max amount of available Shares in the Shareholder's portfolio.
        Parameters:
        comp - The Company of interest
        holder - The shareholder who owns the shares.
        Returns:
        total amount of shares available to sell for the company of interest
